title: How to Learn JavaScript
introduction: JavaScript is a versatile and powerful programming language used for adding interactivity to websites. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, learning JavaScript opens up a world of possibilities.
details: JavaScript is commonly used for front-end web development to create dynamic and interactive user interfaces. It can also be used for back-end development using platforms like Node.js. Learning JavaScript involves understanding its syntax, data types, functions, objects, and various built-in methods.
